name: Dubstep Raven
description:
Use your badass raven powers to control time and possess enemies. But watch out for the extreme bullet hell action!

This game is a fusion of Dubstep Ghost and Superhot.

Controls

  • WASD/Arrows - Move
  • Mouse - Aim
  • R - Reset The Current Level
  • M - Mute/unmute the game
  • P - Toggle advanced bullet effects. This will give a performance boost at the expense of making the game look like hairy ballsack

Controls When Possessing Enemy:

  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Right Click - Suicide

Controls When Raven:

  • Left Click - Possess (if close enough to enemy)

Technical

I support recent versions (less then two years old) of:

  • Firefox
  • Chrome
  • The New (Chromium-Based) Edge
  • Brave
  • Opera

The snake game from the loading screen is based on this guy's code. I know how to program snake, I'm just lazy.
